languages.text: "Меня приветствовал Муаран — один из уцелевших провидцев Крудараха. Вместе с ним — горстка {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g}, избежавшая гибели и нашедшая дорогу сюда — в разоренную колыбель нашего народа. О, как велик был их гнев, когда они узрели, как мон-кай разорили наш цветущий сад!"

traits.locale_text: "Меня приветствовал Муаран — один из уцелевших провидцев Крудараха. Вместе с ним — горстка детей Асурьян, избежавшая гибели и нашедшая дорогу сюда — в разоренную колыбель нашего народа. О, как велик был их гнев, когда они узрели, как мон-кай разорили наш цветущий сад!"

languages.text: "It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving Farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"
languages.original_text: "Меня приветствовал Муаран — один из уцелевших провидцев Крудараха. Вместе с ним — горстка {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g}, избежавшая гибели и нашедшая дорогу сюда — в разоренную колыбель нашего народа. О, как велик был их гнев, когда они узрели, как мон-кай разорили наш цветущий сад!"

traits.locale_text: "It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of Asuryani who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"

"It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of Asuryani who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"

"It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of Asuryani who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"

"It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving Farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"

languages.text: 「ここに来た我を歓迎したのがムアランだ。生き残ったクルダラの先見司たちの一人だった。ムアランは死を免れた一握りの{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリヤーニ{/g}と共に、ここへ通じる道を見つけた。我が一族の壊れた揺りかごへと。モン＝ケイが、栄華を極めた我らの庭を踏みにじるひどい有様を見て、ムアランたちは怒り狂った！」
languages.original_text: "It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving Farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"

traits.locale_text: 「ここに来た我を歓迎したのがムアランだ。生き残ったクルダラの先見司たちの一人だった。ムアランは死を免れた一握りの{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリヤーニ{/g}と共に、ここへ通じる道を見つけた。我が一族の壊れた揺りかごへと。モン＝ケイが、栄華を極めた我らの庭を踏みにじるひどい有様を見て、ムアランたちは怒り狂った！」

languages.text: “当时负责迎接我的人是穆兰，他是克鲁达拉赫幸存的其中一位先知。他和另外几位{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}方舟灵族{/g}逃过了一劫，找到了通往这里的道路，找到了我们灵族被摧毁的摇篮。而当他们看到猴子们是如何蹂躏我们繁茂的花园时，他们怒不可遏！”
languages.original_text: "It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving Farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"

traits.locale_text: “当时负责迎接我的人是穆兰，他是克鲁达拉赫幸存的其中一位先知。他和另外几位{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}方舟灵族{/g}逃过了一劫，找到了通往这里的道路，找到了我们灵族被摧毁的摇篮。而当他们看到猴子们是如何蹂躏我们繁茂的花园时，他们怒不可遏！”

languages.text: «Fue Muaran, uno de los pocos videntes de Crudarach que quedaban, quien me recibió aquí. Le acompañaban un puñado de {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} que habían escapado a la muerte y hallado el camino hasta este lugar, la devastada cuna de nuestra especie. ¡Montaron en cólera al ver que los mon-keigh habían profanado nuestro floreciente jardín!».
languages.original_text: "It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving Farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"

traits.locale_text: «Fue Muaran, uno de los pocos videntes de Crudarach que quedaban, quien me recibió aquí. Le acompañaban un puñado de {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} que habían escapado a la muerte y hallado el camino hasta este lugar, la devastada cuna de nuestra especie. ¡Montaron en cólera al ver que los mon-keigh habían profanado nuestro floreciente jardín!».

languages.text: "Muaran hat mich hier willkommen geheißen – er war einer der überlebenden Runenpropheten von Crudarach. Er war dem Tod mit einer Handvoll {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} entkommen und hatte den Weg hierher gefunden, in die zerstörte Wiege unserer Art. Sie waren empört, als sie sahen, wie die Chem-Pan-Sey unseren blühenden Garten verwüstet hatten!"
languages.original_text: "It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving Farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"

traits.locale_text: "Muaran hat mich hier willkommen geheißen – er war einer der überlebenden Runenpropheten von Crudarach. Er war dem Tod mit einer Handvoll {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} entkommen und hatte den Weg hierher gefunden, in die zerstörte Wiege unserer Art. Sie waren empört, als sie sahen, wie die Chem-Pan-Sey unseren blühenden Garten verwüstet hatten!"

languages.text: « J'ai été accueillie par Muaran, l'un des derniers Grands Prophètes de Crudarach. Il était accompagné de quelques {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryanis{/g} qui avaient échappé à la mort et eux aussi trouvé le chemin du berceau en ruines de nos semblables. Une colère noire s'est emparée d'eux lorsqu'ils ont vu que les mon-keigh avaient ravagé notre beau jardin ! »
languages.original_text: "It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving Farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai été accueillie par Muaran, l'un des derniers Grands Prophètes de Crudarach. Il était accompagné de quelques {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryanis{/g} qui avaient échappé à la mort et eux aussi trouvé le chemin du berceau en ruines de nos semblables. Une colère noire s'est emparée d'eux lorsqu'ils ont vu que les mon-keigh avaient ravagé notre beau jardin ! »

languages.text: "Beni burada Muaran karşıladı. Crudarach'tan sağ kurtulan Ötesezenlerden biriydi. Yanında da ölümden kaçıp buraya, türümüzün yıkık beşiğine giden yolu bulan bir avuç {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} vardı. Mon-keighlerin, dört başı mamur bahçemizi nasıl harap ettiğini gördüklerinde öfkeden deliye döndüler!"
languages.original_text: "It was Muaran who welcomed me here — he was one of the surviving Farseers of Crudarach. He was with a handful of {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryani{/g} who had escaped death and found the path here, to the destroyed cradle of our kind. They were outraged when they saw how the mon-keigh had ravaged our flourishing garden!"

traits.locale_text: "Beni burada Muaran karşıladı. Crudarach'tan sağ kurtulan Ötesezenlerden biriydi. Mon-keighlerin, dört başı mamur bahçemizi nasıl harap ettiğini gördüklerinde öfkeden deliye döndüler!"
